import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var PizzaCardSlice=createSlice({name:"card",initialState:{PizzaCards:[],addItems:[],ActiveType:[],ActiveSize:[]},reducers:{setPizzaCard:function setPizzaCard(state,action){state.PizzaCards=action.payload;},setaddItems:function setaddItems(state,action){state.addItems.push(action.payload);},setActiveType:function setActiveType(state,action){state.ActiveType=action.payload;},setActiveSize:function setActiveSize(state,action){state.ActiveSize=action.payload;}}});var _PizzaCardSlice$actio=PizzaCardSlice.actions,setaddItems=_PizzaCardSlice$actio.setaddItems,setPizzaCard=_PizzaCardSlice$actio.setPizzaCard,setActiveType=_PizzaCardSlice$actio.setActiveType,setActiveSize=_PizzaCardSlice$actio.setActiveSize;export{setaddItems,setPizzaCard,setActiveType,setActiveSize};export default PizzaCardSlice.reducer;
